item.title: TechCrunch Minute: Reddit is taking a stand against AI crawlers
item.description:
Reddit is taking a stand against AI companies — or at least asking them to pay up. Earlier this week, Reddit announced that it’s changing its Robots Exclusion Protocol, also known as its robots.txt file. This dry-sounding edit is part of a larger negotiation/battle between the AI companies that are hungry for content they can […]

item.title: ChatGPT: Everything you need to know about the AI-powered chatbot
item.description:
ChatGPT, OpenAI’s text-generating AI chatbot, has taken the world by storm since its launch in November 2022. What started as a tool to hyper-charge productivity through writing essays and code with short text prompts has evolved into a behemoth used by more than 92% of Fortune 500 companies. That growth has propelled OpenAI itself into […]

item.title: Milky Way's black hole 'exhaust vent' discovered in eerie X-ray observations
Crypto Market Braces for Volatility as $10B in Bitcoin and Ether Options Set to Expire
Massive authentication vulnerability risks compromising much of the internet
item.description: A new exploit found in the enterprise software MOVEit Transfer can have serious consequences for large swaths of the web.
